title: Hoover Max Extract 77 Not Picking Up Water?
description: Joy, we saw your review on Hoover.com and we wanted to help get your Hoover Max Extract 77 working properly. Let us know if you need more help!

asset.author: Hoover
asset.hookText: Joy, we saw your review on Hoover.com and we wanted to help get your Hoover Max Extract 77 working properly. Let us know if you need more help!

transcripts: Hi joy this is Felicia from Hoover customer care. I read your review about your max extract not picking up and I think I know what may be wrong. It could be a dirty filter or may not be put together right. First check this orange screen filter make sure there is no gunk in it. Then make sure the hose is security here in its holster. Once you've done that check the nozzle and recovery tank to make sure they're installed like this. Turn on your max extract and slide your handle down hold it in one spot and squeeze the trigger like this for 10 seconds then pull it back slowly like this. You should see it pick up well. Let me know if you need any more help.
